channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Wow Skype Buttons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Wow Skype Buttons

item.title: CVE-2024-3474|2024-06-04T17:33:02.444Z -- unknown -- wow%20skype%20buttons
item.description: The Wow Skype Buttons WordPress plugin before 4.0.4 does not have CSRF checks in some bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins perform unwanted actions, such as deleting buttons via CSRF attacks
